blogs.title: Building Scalable React Applications
blogs.excerpt: Learn the best practices for building large-scale React applications with modern tools and techniques.
blogs.content:
Building scalable React applications requires careful consideration of architecture, state management, and performance optimization. In this post, we'll explore the best practices and patterns that help maintain large codebases.

First, we'll look at project structure and code organization. Then, we'll dive into state management solutions and when to use them. Finally, we'll cover performance optimization techniques.
blogs.author: Yuang Tong

blogs.title: The Future of Web Development
blogs.excerpt: Exploring upcoming trends and technologies that will shape the future of web development.
blogs.content:
The web development landscape is constantly evolving. New technologies and approaches emerge regularly, changing how we build applications. Let's explore what the future might hold.

We'll discuss emerging technologies like Web Assembly, Edge Computing, and AI-assisted development. We'll also look at how these technologies might impact the way we work.
blogs.author: Yuang Tong

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with features like cart management, payment processing, and order tracking. Built with scalability and performance in mind.

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: Generate stunning portfolios with a few clicks
projects.fullDescription: A tool that helps developers create professional portfolios quickly and easily. Features include customizable templates and real-time preview.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Modern and interactive portfolio website with dark mode and multilingual support
projects.fullDescription:
A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and TypeScript. Features a clean, minimalist design with interactive elements and smooth animations.

Key Features:
• Dark/Light mode toggle
• Multi-language support (EN/ES)
• Interactive cursor effects
• Smooth page transitions
• Responsive design
• Dynamic project showcase
• Blog integration

projects.title: Passguard: Password Generator
projects.description: A bold web solution built with React
projects.fullDescription:
Passguard is a robust password generation tool that empowers users to create secure and customizable passwords.

Key Features:
• Custom password length settings
• Multiple character type options
• Password strength indicator
• One-click copy functionality
• Secure password storage

works.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
works.description: Enterprise analytics platform with AI-driven insights and real-time data visualization.
works.fullDescription: A comprehensive analytics platform that leverages AI to provide actionable insights for businesses. Features include real-time data processing and customizable dashboards.

works.title: Sustainable Fashion Marketplace
works.description: Modern marketplace connecting eco-conscious fashion brands with consumers.
works.fullDescription: An innovative marketplace focused on sustainable and ethical fashion. Features include vendor management and sustainable certification tracking.
